item.title: TortoiseSVN doesn't prompt for authentication
item.description: Here’s one in the series of stupid things I’ve done but which Google has thrown no answers, so I post it here to help out fellow idiots. Today’s episode involves our SCM tool, TortoiseSVN. I’d been happily using it for over a year, when suddenly I couldn’t commit any more. I could browse and checkout to my heart’s content, but when I tried to commit, boom: Commit failed (details follow): Authorization failed
